pullrequest.title: Switch to six independent GPS sensor noise models

content.raw:
I believe we can deprecate `NoisePtr GetNoise(unsigned int _index = 0) const` and implement `NoisePtr GetNoise(const SensorNoiseType _type) const` as a replacement. 

The only users who would be affected are people who may have directly used the `noises` vector, which should be fairly minimal.

The Migration guide should be updated to include this information.
content.html:
I believe we can deprecate NoisePtr GetNoise(unsigned int _index = 0) const and implement NoisePtr GetNoise(const SensorNoiseType _type) const as a replacement.

The only users who would be affected are people who may have directly used the noises vector, which should be fairly minimal.

The Migration guide should be updated to include this information.
